fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 is an infectious disease, and a video claiming it isn’t is wrong
fact_check_explanation_summary: The woman in this video is wrong to blame radiation—and wrong about other things as well

fact_check_explanation_title: The Pfizer Covid-19 candidate vaccine is not too cold to be called a vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Ebola vaccine had to be stored at temperatures this low too.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is the UK's trade deal with Japan better than the EU's?
fact_check_explanation_summary: We don’t know how much better the UK-Japan trade deal is compared to the EU-Japan deal, but it isn’t expected to be worse.

fact_check_explanation_title: RNA Covid-19 vaccines will not change your DNA
fact_check_explanation_summary: Several candidate vaccines use this technology.

fact_check_explanation_title: This is a real letter from an NHS trust that dealt with no Covid-19 deaths
fact_check_explanation_summary: The trust provides community, mental health, and disability services.

fact_check_explanation_title: There are no foetal cells in the AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: Cells derived from human foetal cells used in production don’t make it to the final product.

fact_check_explanation_title: Nadine Dorries says email from her office on vaccines does not reflect her views
fact_check_explanation_summary: The MP has said the email was sent by a new staff member and didn’t represent her view or government policy.

fact_check_explanation_title: GPs and other frontline medical workers will be among the first to receive a Covid-19 vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: The government has published plans on who will be vaccinated first.

fact_check_explanation_title: Danish study on mask efficacy only tells us half the story
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Spectator article suggests a new study which found mask-wearing didn’t lower Covid-19 infection rates is proof masks don’t work. But the study didn’t look at whether masks help others.

fact_check_explanation_title: Research suggesting increased Covid-19 risk for dog-owners may be barking up the wrong tree
fact_check_explanation_summary: The research claims dog walkers have a higher risk of catching Covid-19 but it has a number of methodological flaws.

fact_check_explanation_title: The Daily Mail’s chart of Covid-19 death figures doesn’t use the real numbers
fact_check_explanation_summary: The chart of weekly deaths claimed to show that deaths were barely higher than previous years, but the figures are wrong.

fact_check_explanation_title: This picture of a vaccine vial from March 2020 is real
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Oxford vaccine has been in development since January 2020.
